pages.text: $(item)Chunk loaders$() are energy powered chunk loaders.$(br2)There's no recipe provided by default.

pages.title: Upgrades
pages.text: Adding more $(item)Emerald tuned crystals$() will increase the maximum range in all directions. Use LUA to adjust the exact shape.$(br2)Adding more $(item)Superconductors$() will drastically reduce energy consumption.
